directions: Blend beet, carrots, and ginger together in a blender until smooth. Add water if mixture is too thick. Add almonds to beet mixture and blend until smooth. Add spirulina and ice and blend until smooth.
ingredients: 1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled and chopped
1/4 cup ice cubes, or as desired
title: Beet, Carrot, Almond, Ginger, and Spirulina Smoothie
